book.name: JOB
book.title: This book contains the account of the intense suffering of Job and of God restoring him. We call this book Job

content.text: “When are you going to stop talking [RHQ]?
If you would stop talking and listen, we could tell you something.
Why do you think that we are as stupid as cattle? [DOU, RHQ]
By being very angry and hurting yourself,
do you think that doing that will shake the earth,
or cause the rocks in the mountains to move? [RHQ]?
“What will happen is that the lives of wicked people like you end
as quickly as we can put out a light or extinguish the flame of a fire.
And when the lamps above them in their tents are extinguished,
there will be no light in those tents.
For many years they walked confidently,
but later in life it was as though they stumbled and fell,
because they themselves did not heed the advice that they gave to others.
It was as though they walked into their own net
or fell into a pit that they themselves have dug.
It was as though a trap grabbed their heels and held them fast [DOU],
as though the noose of a rope that was hidden on the ground, whose other end was fastened to the limb of a tree,
seized them when they walked into it.
Everywhere they went, there were things that caused them to be terrified;
it was as though those things were pursuing them and biting at their heels.
They became hungry, with the result that they had no strength.
They experienced disasters [PRS] constantly.
Diseases spread all over their skin/bodies;
diseases that ◄caused their bodies to decay/destroyed their arms and legs►.
When they died, they were snatched away from their tents
and brought to the one who rules over the dead.
Now their tents will burn down,
when burning sulfur rains down on those tents!
Because those who died had no descendants,
they were like trees whose roots have dried up and whose branches have all withered [MET].
No one on the earth will remember them any more;
no one on any street will even remember their names [MTY].
They will be expelled from the earth where there is light,
and they will be sent into the place where it is dark.
They will have no children or grandchildren,
no descendants where they previously lived.
People from the east to the west who hear about what happened to them,
will be shocked and horrified.
And that is what happens to ungodly/sinful people like you,
to people who ◄have no interest in/have rejected► God.”
